about_the_game:
Caterina works in a tavern not far from the capital, but one night below the tavern something awaken, something ancient, something evil with endless hunger.

A dark fantasy 3D vampire brothel management game for adults with RPG elements. Caterina must manage the brothel to meet her master's demands, which are blood, sacrifice and sex. Can she escape her master, or will she remain a puppet for all eternity?

Demo contains:

You have the ability to choose the fate of your customers. You can spare them or either kill them.

You can make potions, by planting and harvesting plants and mixing them up.

You can customize your main character's and employee's appearance.

You can keep up with your surroundings by checking up on both the employee's and prisoners interactions.

content_descriptors.notes:
This is a dark fantasy game and contains depictions of frequent sexual interactions between humans and humanoid vampires. The content in this game includes but is not limited to-

- Sexual Violence
- Group Sex
- Prostitution
- BDSM Elements
- Non-Consensual Sex
- Murder
- Use Of Drugs/Alcohol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
